ISSUE.TITLE: Refactor IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync for Async Query Execution
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Updated IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync method to use query.AnyAsync for improved async query execution. See PR #7512

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7540 Optimize Async Query Handling in IsEntityMappingExistsAsync (#7511) * Use query.AnyAsync for async operations in IsEntityMappingExistsAsync * feedback resolve * refactor

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7541 Refactor IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync for Async Query Execution (#7512) * Use query.AnyAsync in IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync * feedback resolve * refactor
